plot: Tired of looking for inspiration, Simon spends the day helping out at his grandfathers market stall where he finds it, through a common bond in poetry.
title: The Good Men of Leicester
plot_es: Tired of looking for inspiration, Simon spends the day helping out at his grandfathers market stall where he finds it, through a common bond in poetry.
plot_en: Tired of looking for inspiration, Simon spends the day helping out at his grandfathers market stall where he finds it, through a common bond in poetry.
